text: @Feargal_Sharkey From what I‚Äôve read of the parish council minutes, the council are well aware of the Lugg‚Äôs SSSI status and the need for approval from the @EnvAgency Unlikely they acted without thinking they had approval. EA must clarify their role in this ASAP.

@GeoffDa84684078 @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @WMerciaPolice @HfdsCouncil Fallen trees are important habitats in their own right - and they slow rivers and promote local flooding (so reducing flood peaks downstream). Cattle and children can be kept safe by fencing. there's no need to destroy valuable habitats to do so.
